alert.note: Alert for Broome; Tioga (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 18 at 6:35AM EST until December 21 at 5:00AM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Binghamton NY has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Pennsylvania...New York... Susquehanna River At Conklin affecting Susquehanna and Broome Counties. Susquehanna River At Vestal affecting Broome and Tioga Counties. Susquehanna River At Bainbridge affecting Chenango and Delaware Counties. Susquehanna River At Waverly/Sayre affecting Bradford and Tioga Counties. Tioughnioga River At Cortland affecting Cortland County. Beaver Kill At Cooks Falls affecting Sullivan and Delaware Counties. Oneida Creek At Oneida affecting Oneida and Madison Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO EARLY THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Susquehanna River at Vestal. * WHEN...From this evening to early Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 18.0 feet, Flood stage. The river overflows banks and lowland flooding begins within the flood plain. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:00 AM EST Monday the stage was 11.6 feet. - Bankfull stage is 18.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this evening to a crest of 19.1 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage Wednesday afternoon. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening at 645 PM EST.
